title: "impossible case reached" while run cargo doc for package "typenum"
body:
rustc panicked while i ran cargo doc.

I tried this code:
```bash
> cargo new -- bin crash
     Created binary (application) `crash` project
> cd crash
> cargo add typenum
      Adding typenum v1.10.0 to dependencies
> cargo doc
    Updating `git://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/crates.io-index` index
   Compiling typenum v1.10.0                                                                                                                                                
 Documenting typenum v1.10.0                                                                                                                                                
error: internal compiler error: librustc/traits/structural_impls.rs:178: impossible case reached                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                            
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'Box<Any>', librustc_errors/lib.rs:599:9                                                                                                     
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                            
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                            
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                            
note: rustc 1.30.0-nightly (63c75d375 2018-09-21) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                            
error: Could not document `typenum`.                                                                                                                                        

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --crate-name typenum /home/aloxaf/.cargo/registry/src/mirrors.ustc.edu.cn-61ef6e0cd06fb9b8/typenum-1.10.0/src/lib.rs --cap-lints allow --color always -o /tmp/crash/target/doc -L dependency=/tmp/crash/target/debug/deps` (exit code: 1)
```

## Meta
`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.30.0-nightly (63c75d375 2018-09-21)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 63c75d375d76d0bcc586f9cb5520ced24bc58450
commit-date: 2018-09-21
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.30.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
```
